Manual Research 2. Scripted Tools 3. MCP Integration Setup and Usage Quick Setup Learn More Academic research involves frequent research discovery : finding papers, code, related models and datasets. This typically means switching between platforms like arXiv , GitHub , and Hugging Face , manually piecing together connections. The Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a standard that allows agentic models to communicate with external tools and data sources. For research discovery, this means AI can use research tools through natural language requests, automating platform switching and cross-referencing.
